评论详情: I’ve worn it twice. Looks great with leggings. It’s soft and warm. Love the collar and big gold buttons. Super cute. Good workmanship.

评论概述: So cute I got it in multiple colors
评论详情: Loves this so much I ordered three more colors. Super cute and comfy. Can dress up or down. I ordered up one size because I wanted it big enough to layer. Definitely could have ordered my usual size.
I love this sweater, but it is very oversized. I think I’d order a size down next time.
Way too big. This was returned.

评论概述: Oh it’s a YES for me!
评论详情: This cardigan, are we joking? This is stunning! I ordered a size medium in the khaki shade and to say im obsessed is putting it lightly. It fits oversized, so I’d size down one. It has gorgeous gold buttons & the cutest neckline detail. This looks high end and kept me warm tonight while not having too much weight on me. It felt and fit just right!  Update: I ordered this in black as well because I loved the khaki so much, but the buttons on the black came very discolored; a little green and flaky looking - disappointing! Also has areas that seem like they’ll fall apart quickly. I think this may be a hit or miss, but so far my khaki one is 10 times better than the black.
I never write reviews but this sweater is SO good! I wore it today and got SO many compliments! It’s perfectly oversized, it’s soft and cozy! I already ordered it in another color!

I was super excited to find a chunky oversized sweater. I read the reviews and while some said the buttons would tarnish others said it hasn’t for them, yet at least. Upon receiving my sweater today I opened it and the some buttons were green, some were tarnished, or rubbing off. Let me say this was not the main reason I returned this, I knew these gold buttons would do that after a wash or two but I would’ve still like to have worn this a couple times with good looking buttons. The other thing that’s a personal bother for me is the wrist area is not stretchable and I’m someone who likes it loose so I can roll up the sleeves and adjust however I need to.
The color that they say is brown is not! It’s a dark olive color,but very loose fitting and cozy.

Sweater buttons came looking like they were sprayed copper and missed in some places.  Definitely not gold.  More orange and heavier in some areas than others and faded silver on some parts of the button.  It’s a no for me
This is more than oversized, also the quality of the yarn is not great, it’s a wear once type of garment. I’m returning it.
Looks very nice and very comfortable
I am obsessed with this cardigan!! I love the oversized look & the button details. The quality is perfection and it is a staple piece for fall/winter! I can’t recommend enough.

Attention petite women, I do not recommend this sweater. The fit runs absolutely massive. You will be swimming in this sweater. There's a balance between oversized and huge, and this crosses that line for sure. Such a bummer because it's pretty cute!

This sweater is meant to be oversized.  It's very cute with the puffy sleeves.  Great outer layer for fall.  It would be better if it has pockets but doesn't bother me that much.  I am 5ft and 110 lbs and got a S.  I loved it so much that I got a black one as well.
This sweater is so soft and the buttons are so elegant and really elevate the look. It pills easily but I feel like that can be resolved easily

Cozy and Warm and a perfect addition to any wardrobe for fall /winter.  I am a neutral kind of person and I've wore it with Leggins, Jeans and Slacks. Goes well with all of them. You won't be disappointed.

This sweater is great quality, very soft and warm. However they aren't joking when it comes to the oversized description. I could fit two of me in it. I should have known based of the model because that's a pretty accurate photo.  With that being said, I'm keeping it Lol.  The quality /look is so great and cute that I've talked myself into over looking, like I put on someone else's sweater.

When I initially opened this sweater I noticed that it looked like the size of a couch. I laughed and said to my husband that there’s no way I was sent a medium. I knew it was oversized but I didn’t know just HOW big it was going to be. When I put it on I was pleasantly surprised at how much I liked it. It’s cute!
Love this sweater! It’s a medium weight and does keep you warm on top of being adorable.

I ordered my regular large, and it’s plenty oversized in a good way. I’m sad it’s as scratchy as it is, it looks soft- I mean it’s soft but maybe I’m just sensitive to it or need to wash it. I’m going to keep it I think wearing a shirt under will help.

The sweater itself is soft and looks nice at first glance. It’s a good amount of oversized and once on it does give a good shape. After wearing awhile the fabric blend starts to become obvious as in it gets a little itchy and in areas like wear my shoulder bag strap rests and the underarms area starts to pill from all the movement. Washed and dried in a laundry bag to help preserve the sweater but overall I don’t see this holding up for a long term type of use.
This is a cute sweater.  I wear a 12/14 and this is an xl. It is HUGE.  They are not kidding when they say oversized! It will look super cute with some leggings!

The stock photos are definitely of the sweater styled very purposely. This is just interesting. My 17 year old picked this out and upon first trying it on declared herself to be a marshmallow. Do not, I repeat, do not attempt to wear the sweater buttoned. It definitely elevates the sweater to unbutton it and allow it to drape. The sleeves are comically short when you first see them because the body is so wide, but once on that proportion isn't as obvious. Definitely size down. This is not made for long arms. My daughter is a size 0/2 5'7" and the sleeves are nearly long enough. The color is more ivory than white and the fabric is very soft.

This cardigan is cute with its balloon sleeves. It is long in length and covers my bum area. It is very oversized but it is super warm and soft. The gold button detail is cute. The inside-out stitching on the shoulders is interesting. It bothered me at first but I actually don’t mind it now. There are no pockets.

评论概述: BIG, BOLD and COMFY for Fall & Winter!
评论详情: This Saodimallsu oversized cardigan is just that: Oversized. But wow is it a fashion statement! The chunky knit is made of a soft yarn. The cut is big and broad.  Wearing it kind of makes you feel like you're getting a big bear hug when you wrap it around! The design is unique and the gold buttons make a big fashion statement. If you like super big cozy sweaters in the Fall or Winter -- consider this one!
This cardigan is perfect for the fall time. It works as both a light jacket or a shirt with a thinner one underneath. Dress up or down,it didn't make me feel hot at any point.
I picked this because my store I manage it matches the deco.  I love the comfort and softness of it.

评论概述: Ordered it oversized, super comfortable to cuddle up in
评论详情: This sweater is super soft, beautiful in color and is the perfect weight (meaning it's not an overly thick sweater or super thin)  I ordered the sweater in blue/white and the baby blue/sky blue is such a soft and calming color to me. I purposely ordered it in an extra-large so that it would fit more relaxed and loosely.  Larger pockets in front are great for a cell-phone or to keep your hands warm.  I see this sweater being matched with a tee shirt and a pair of skinny jeans and making a casual comfortable outfit for going into town.  It's summer right now as I write this review but I can already anticipate this sweater being warm for the upcoming fall/winter seasons.

I like this sweater. Thicker than I expected but it will be great for the cold months. I love the pattern it is so unique and cute! Fits as expected and covers the bottom which is great because I live for leggings.

I really did not get much of an impression from this via the product page, it just looked like an average sweater to me. And in a sense, it is. It's 100% polyester so it's not as "soft" as it could be (but it is NOT scratchy in ANY way whatsoever), but it's comfortable. And it's WARM. It's a good weave on this sweater. It's built bulky, in that it's a loose fit. I got the khaki color so it's an offwhite and khaki color striped. That neutral is perfect to match with SO many things.  There's no collar in the way, and the cuffs on the sleeves fit well for me. I have GREAT range of motion in it, love that it's a loose fit. The length is good on me, too. The knit on it is really tight and hence the sweater is super warm and cozy. Love that. I would wear this in the fall, winter, OR the spring, which makes it a good year-round sweater for me. The pockets are a wonderful addition.  The tag is on the inside left side seam of it and scratchy, but because you'll be wearing a shirt for sure you likely won't really feel it. I don't. Apparently you should hand wash this or machine wash cold. Do not bleach. Lay flat or hang to dry.  Overall this sweater was a wonderful surprise. The loose fit is so comfortable and it has pockets! It's warm and cozy and beautifully made. You CAN machine wash cold. I'm sold. Recommend.

The Saodimallsu Women's Checkered Cardigan Sweater is a perfect blend of comfort and style. This oversized, open-front knit sweater features a chic checkered pattern with classic stripes, making it a versatile piece that can effortlessly elevate any outfit. The long sleeves and cozy material ensure warmth during cooler days, while the loose fit provides a relaxed and comfortable feel. Ideal for layering over casual or dressy ensembles, this cardigan adds a trendy touch to your wardrobe. Overall, it's a stylish and practical choice for any fashion-forward individual.

This is a very cute sweater. It has both a checkered and striped pattern. The cuffs have a ribbed design. The sweater has two front pockets. It is an open style, so there are no buttons or zippers in front. The sweater is cozy and comfortable. It fits as expected. The only thing that I’m not crazy about is that it’s dry, clean only, but I believe you can wash it in the machine on a cold setting. I would not put it in the dryer. this sweater will look great with jeans and a cute top. I can’t wait for winter so I can wear it.
